content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am interested in maximizing my rental income, so I am open to negotiating the price. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am flexible with the rental price. However, I am looking for the lowest price possible that is fair for both of us. Can you give me an initial offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am willing to be flexible on the rental price, but I am also looking for a fair deal. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am willing to start at €800 per month. Is this an acceptable starting point for negotiations?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euro per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am glad to hear that we have reached an agreement on the rental price. I am happy to proceed with the negotiation and sign the lease with you. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before finalizing the agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
